page.title: 15SPORTS'DAY AT SCHOOL
page.content: Each year we have two Sports' Days in our school. The first of these is our own school. We used to have the Juniors and Infants together on one day but now because there are so many children in our school we have them on separate days. Each child takes part in a race and we are in four houses. We have ordinary running races and then other races like skipping races, dressing-up races, relay races and one lap of the field races. We also have a tug of war where two teams pull on a rope and the one who pulls the middle of the rope into their half is the winner. The second Sports' Day is our school who competes against our neighbouring school - St. Mark's. We have races against each other but there is no winner - it is just for fun.
